On 2002-07-02 at 03:53 Amardeep Singh Bhatia wrote:

>Hi all,
>        I am new to junit, so can anyone tell me how to generate 
>testresults using junit's TestResult class. 

Instantiate a TestResult and call its methods to add failures and
errors and so on. Is there something more specific you need to know
about it?

> Also can any body tell 
>me from where to get notes on junit apart from that provided by 
>junit.

http://www.diasparsoftware.com/articles/JUnit/jUnitStarterGuide.html
